alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 12:09AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Muscogee and central Harris Counties through 100 AM EST... At 1209 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Bleecker, or 7 miles west of Smiths, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds 40 to 50 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Pine Mountain, Goat Rock Lake, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Mountain Hill, Cataula, Mulberry Grove, Lake Harding, Whitesville-Pine Lake and Fortson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
